statements: UPDATE patents SET patent_name = 'New Patent Name', patent_description = 'New Description' WHERE patent_id = 1;

UPDATE research_projects SET end_date = '2022-12-31', start_date = '2020-01-01' WHERE project_id = 54321;
UPDATE researchers SET specialization = 'Machine Learning' WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice';
